description: This file sets up an asynchronous agent using the agno library to interact with IBM WatsonX model, and runs a sample prompt to print the response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that manages interactions with language models.

classes.name: WatsonX
classes.description: A class representing the IBM WatsonX model.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Runs a prompt with streaming response.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response from the agent.
